# Loading in data

```{r}
votes <- read_csv("data/votes.csv")
cultural <- read_csv2("data/cultural_similarity.csv")
contestants <- read_csv("data/contestants.csv")
participants <- read_csv("data/shortname_mapping.csv")
```

## Subsetting votes to specific years

```{r}
votes <- votes %>% filter(year >= 2000) 
```

  country <- participants$country[i]

  cult2 <- cultural %>% filter(country2 == country)
